trans-unit.source: Defines a macro to be applied to the Haskell source. Parameter names are comma-separated, not inside parens. Such macro is invoked as other #-constructs, starting with #name. The definition will be put in the C program inside parens as arguments of printf. To refer to a parameter, close the quote, put a parameter name and open the quote again, to let C string literals concatenate. Or use printf‘s format directives. Values of arguments must be given as strings, unless the macro stringifies them itself using the C preprocessor’s #parameter syntax.
trans-unit.target: 定义要应用于Haskell源的宏。参数名称以逗号分隔，而不是在括号内。此类宏与其他 # -constructs一样，以 #name 开头。该定义将作为 printf 的参数放在paren中的C程序中。要引用参数，请关闭引号，放置参数名称，然后再次打开引号，以使C字符串文字串联在一起。或使用 printf 的格式指令。参数值必须以字符串形式给出，除非宏使用C预处理程序的 #parameter 语法对其本身进行了字符串化。

trans-unit.source: Defines a macro to be applied to the Haskell source. Parameter names are comma-separated, not inside parens. Such macro is invoked as other #-constructs, starting with #name. The definition will be put in the C program inside parens as arguments of printf. To refer to a parameter, close the quote, put a parameter name and open the quote again, to let C string literals concatenate. Or use printf’s format directives. Values of arguments must be given as strings, unless the macro stringifies them itself using the C preprocessor’s #parameter syntax.

trans-unit.source: Despite sequences being structurally strict from a semantic standpoint, they are in fact implemented using laziness internally. As a result, many operations can be performed incrementally, producing their results as they are demanded. This greatly improves performance in some cases. These functions include
trans-unit.target: 尽管从语义的角度来看序列在结构上是严格的，但实际上它们是在内部使用惰性实现的。其结果是，很多操作都不能进行增量，生产它们的结果，因为他们需要。在某些情况下，这可以大大提高性能。这些功能包括

trans-unit.target: 关于哪个操作阻塞所有线程，不同的Haskell实现具有不同的特性。

Disable all non-essential messages (this is the default).
trans-unit.target: 禁用所有非必要的信息(这是默认值)。

trans-unit.source: Disable all processing of RTS options. If +RTS appears anywhere on the command line, then the program will abort with an error message. If the GHCRTS environment variable is set, then the program will emit a warning message, GHCRTS will be ignored, and the program will run as normal.
trans-unit.target: 禁用RTS选项的所有处理。如果 +RTS 出现在命令行中的任何位置，则程序将中止并显示一条错误消息。如果设置了 GHCRTS 环境变量，则程序将发出警告消息， GHCRTS 将被忽略，并且程序将正常运行。

trans-unit.source: Disable allocation limit processing for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 禁用当前线程的分配限制处理。

trans-unit.source: Disable automatic migration for load balancing. Normally the runtime will automatically try to schedule threads across the available CPUs to make use of idle CPUs; this option disables that behaviour. Note that migration only applies to threads; sparks created by par are load-balanced separately by work-stealing.
trans-unit.target: 禁用自动迁移以实现负载平衡。通常，运行时将自动尝试在可用的CPU上调度线程，以利用空闲的CPU。此选项禁用该行为。请注意，迁移仅适用于线程。由 par 产生的火花通过工作窃取分别进行负载平衡。

trans-unit.source: Disable one or more breakpoints by number (use :show breaks to see the number and state of each breakpoint). The * form disables all the breakpoints.

trans-unit.target: 禁用模式防护。 Haskell98 暗示。

trans-unit.source: Disable support for traditional record syntax (as supported by Haskell 98) C {f = x}
trans-unit.target: 禁用对传统记录语法的支持（由Haskell 98支持） C {f = x}

trans-unit.source: Disabled breakpoints can be (re-)enabled with the :enable command. The parameters of the :disable and :enable commands are identical.

Disables all processing of RTS options. Unlike none this treats all RTS flags appearing on the command line the same way as regular arguments. (Passing them on to your program as arguments). GHCRTS options will be processed normally.
trans-unit.target: 禁用RTS选项的所有处理。与 none 不同，这会将所有出现在命令行上的RTS标志与常规参数一样对待。（将它们作为参数传递给您的程序）。 GHCRTS 选项将正常处理。
禁用 -Wcompat 启用的所有警告。
禁用 -Wcompat 启用的所有警告。
禁用任何以前的 -fprof-auto ， -fprof-auto-top 或 -fprof-auto-exported 选项。
禁用任何以前的 -fprof-cafs 选项。
禁用任何以前的 -fprof-auto ， -fprof-auto-top 或 -fprof-auto-exported 选项。
禁用任何以前的 -fprof-cafs 选项。

trans-unit.source: Disables showing a list of valid hole fits for typed holes in type error messages.
trans-unit.target: 禁用在类型错误信息中显示有效的孔配合列表。

trans-unit.source: Disables the RTS’s normal behaviour of garbage-collecting CAFs (Constant Applicative Forms, in other words top-level expressions). This option is useful for specialised applications that do runtime dynamic linking, where code dynamically linked in the future might require the value of a CAF that would otherwise be garbage-collected.
trans-unit.target: 禁用RTS的垃圾回收CAF（常量应用程序形式，换句话说，顶级表达式）的正常行为。此选项对于执行运行时动态链接的专用应用程序很有用，因为将来运行动态链接的代码可能需要CAF的值，否则该CAF的值将被垃圾回收。

trans-unit.source: Disables the sorting of the list of valid hole fits for typed holes in type error messages.
trans-unit.target: 在类型错误信息中禁用有效孔配合列表的排序。

trans-unit.target: 丢弃 IO 操作的结果：

trans-unit.target: 放弃 IO 操作的返回值

Display a list of the cycles in the module graph. This is useful when trying to eliminate such cycles.
trans-unit.target: 显示模块图中的循环列表。这在试图消除这些循环时很有用。

trans-unit.source: Display a summary of the available flags and exit successfully.
trans-unit.target: 显示可用标志的摘要并成功退出。

trans-unit.source: Display equation incompatibilities in closed type families

Display some stats after evaluating each expression, including the elapsed time and number of bytes allocated. NOTE: the allocation figure is only accurate to the size of the storage manager’s allocation area, because it is calculated at every GC. Hence, you might see values of zero if no GC has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 评估每个表达式后，显示一些统计信息，包括经过的时间和分配的字节数。注意：分配数字仅精确到存储管理器分配区域的大小，因为它是在每个GC上计算的。因此，如果未发生GC，则可能会看到零值。

trans-unit.source: Display the heap profile using a postscript viewer such as Ghostview, or print it out on a Postscript-capable printer.
trans-unit.target: 使用postscript查看器(如Ghostview)显示堆配置文件,或在支持Postscript的打印机上打印出来。

trans-unit.source: Display the history of evaluation steps. With a number, displays that many steps (default: 20). For use with :trace; see Tracing and history. To set the number of history entries stored by GHCi, use the -fghci-hist-size=⟨n⟩ flag.
trans-unit.target: 显示评估步骤的历史记录。用数字显示那么多步骤（默认值：20）。适用于 :trace ; 请参阅跟踪和历史记录。要设置GHCi存储的历史记录条目数，请使用 -fghci-hist-size=⟨n⟩ 标志。

trans-unit.source: Display the internal structure of a lazy Text.
trans-unit.target: 显示惰性 Text 的内部结构。

trans-unit.source: Display the type of each variable bound after a statement is entered at the prompt. If the statement is a single expression, then the only variable binding will be for the variable it.
trans-unit.target: 在提示符下输入语句后，显示绑定的每个变量的类型。如果该语句是单个表达式，则唯一的变量绑定将是变量 it 。

trans-unit.source: Displays Safe Haskell information about the given module (or the current module if omitted). This includes the trust type of the module and its containing package.
trans-unit.target: 显示给定模块的安全Haskell信息(如果省略则显示当前模块)。这包括模块的信任类型和它所包含的包。

trans-unit.source: Displays a list of the available commands.
Displays all the class instances available to the argument ⟨type⟩. The command will match ⟨type⟩ with the first parameter of every instance and then check that all constraints are satisfiable.

Displays information about the given name(s). For example, if ⟨name⟩ is a class, then the class methods and their types will be printed; if ⟨name⟩ is a type constructor, then its definition will be printed; if ⟨name⟩ is a function, then its type will be printed. If ⟨name⟩ has been loaded from a source file, then GHCi will also display the location of its definition in the source.
trans-unit.target: 显示给定名称的信息,例如:如果⟨name⟩是类,则打印类的方法和类型;如果⟨name⟩是类,则打印类的方法和类型。例如,如果⟨name⟩是一个类,那么就会打印出类的方法及其类型;如果⟨name⟩是一个类型构造函数,那么就会打印出它的定义;如果⟨name⟩是一个函数,那么就会打印出它的类型。如果⟨name⟩是从源文件中加载的,那么GHCi也会显示其定义在源文件中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Displays the documentation for the given name. Currently the command is restricted to displaying the documentation directly on the declaration in question, ignoring documentation for arguments, constructors etc.
trans-unit.target: 显示指定名称的文档。目前,该命令仅限于直接显示相关声明的文档,而忽略了参数、构造函数等的文档。

trans-unit.source: Displays the identifiers exported by the module ⟨module⟩, which must be either loaded into GHCi or be a member of a package. If ⟨module⟩ is omitted, the most recently-loaded module is used.
trans-unit.target: 显示由模块⟨module⟩导出的标识符,该模块必须被加载到GHCi中,或者是一个包的成员。如果省略了⟨module⟩,则使用最近加载的模块。
显示指定的设置（请参阅 :set ）。

trans-unit.source: Dissolve the association between the stable pointer and the Haskell value. Afterwards, if the stable pointer is passed to deRefStablePtr or freeStablePtr, the behaviour is undefined. However, the stable pointer may still be passed to castStablePtrToPtr, but the Ptr () value returned by castStablePtrToPtr, in this case, is undefined (in particular, it may be nullPtr). Nevertheless, the call to castStablePtrToPtr is guaranteed not to diverge.
trans-unit.target: 分解稳定指针和Haskell值之间的关联。之后，如果将稳定指针传递给 deRefStablePtr 或 freeStablePtr ，则该行为是不确定的。但是，稳定指针仍可以传递给 castStablePtrToPtr ，但是在这种情况下，由 castStablePtrToPtr 返回的 Ptr () 值是不确定的（特别是，它可以为 nullPtr ）。但是，可以保证对 castStablePtrToPtr 的调用不会发生分歧。

trans-unit.source: Dissolve the association between the stable pointer and the Haskell value. Afterwards, if the stable pointer is passed to deRefStablePtr or freeStablePtr, the behaviour is undefined. However, the stable pointer may still be passed to castStablePtrToPtr, but the Ptr () value returned by castStablePtrToPtr, in this case, is undefined (in particular, it may be nullPtr). Nevertheless, the call to castStablePtrToPtr is guaranteed not to diverge.
trans-unit.target: 分解稳定指针和Haskell值之间的关联。之后，如果将稳定指针传递给 deRefStablePtr 或 freeStablePtr ，则该行为是不确定的。但是，稳定指针仍可以传递给 castStablePtrToPtr ，但是在这种情况下，由 castStablePtrToPtr 返回的 Ptr () 值是不确定的（特别是，它可以为 nullPtr ）。但是，可以保证对 castStablePtrToPtr 的调用不会发生分歧。

Distrust all packages by default. See Safe Haskell.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，不信任所有软件包。请参阅Safe Haskell。

trans-unit.source: Division (round down) of natural numbers. Div x 0 is undefined (i.e., it cannot be reduced).
trans-unit.target: 自然数的除法（舍入）。 Div x 0 是未定义的（即无法减少）。

trans-unit.source: Divisor must be non-zero otherwise the GHC runtime will terminate with a division-by-zero fault.
trans-unit.target: 除数必须是非零,否则GHC运行时将以一个逐零除法的故障终止。

trans-unit.source: Do a prefix lookup on the list of built-in commands.
trans-unit.target: 在内置命令列表中进行前缀查询。

trans-unit.source: Do no newline translation at all.
Do not embed the manifest in the executable (Windows only)
trans-unit.target: 不要将清单嵌入到可执行文件中(仅适用于Windows)。

trans-unit.source: Do not garbage-collect CAFs (top-level expressions) at runtime
trans-unit.target: 不要在运行时对CAF(顶层表达式)进行垃圾收集。

trans-unit.target: 不要生成一个清单文件(仅适用于Windows)。

trans-unit.source: Do not mix CatchT with IO. Choose one or the other for the bottom of your transformer stack!
Do not recompile modules just to match changes to HPC flags. This is especially useful for avoiding recompilation when using GHCi, and is enabled by default for GHCi.
trans-unit.target: 不要为了匹配HPC标志的变化而重新编译模块,这对使用GHCi时避免重新编译特别有用。这对于使用GHCi时避免重新编译特别有用,GHCi默认启用。

trans-unit.source: Do not recompile modules just to match changes to optimisation flags. This is especially useful for avoiding recompilation when using GHCi, and is enabled by default for GHCi.
trans-unit.target: 不要为了匹配优化标志的变化而重新编译模块。这对于使用 GHCi 时避免重新编译特别有用,GHCi 默认启用。

trans-unit.source: Do not retain CAFs. Everything reachable from foreign exports will be retained, due to the StablePtrs created by the module initialisation code. unloadObj frees these StablePtrs, which will allow the CAFs to be GC'd and the code to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 不要保留CAFs。unloadObj释放了这些StablePtrs,这将使CAFs被GC'd,代码被删除。

trans-unit.source: Do not talk about "safe"! You do not know what is safe!
trans-unit.target: 不要谈 "安全"! 你不知道什么是安全!

trans-unit.source: Does a path have a drive.
trans-unit.target: 一条路径是否有驱动力。

trans-unit.source: Does automatic cleanup when the action finishes. If there is an exception in the body then it ensures that the process gets terminated and any CreatePipeHandles are closed. In particular this means that if the Haskell thread is killed (e.g. killThread), that the external process is also terminated.
trans-unit.target: 操作完成后自动清除。如果主体中存在异常，则它将确保该过程终止并关闭所有 CreatePipe Handle 。特别是，这意味着如果Haskell线程被杀死（例如 killThread ），则外部进程也将终止。

trans-unit.source: Does automatic cleanup when the action finishes. If there is an exception in the body then it ensures that the process gets terminated and any CreatePipeHandles are closed. In particular this means that if the Haskell thread is killed (e.g. killThread), that the external process is also terminated.
Does the element occur in the structure?
trans-unit.target: 该元素是否出现在结构中?

trans-unit.target: 给定的文件名是否有扩展名?

trans-unit.target: 给定的文件名是否有指定的扩展名?

trans-unit.source: Don’t automatically link in the base and rts packages.
trans-unit.target: 不要自动链接base和rts软件包。

trans-unit.source: Don’t forget to use the same -package options on the ghc -M command line as you would when compiling; this enables the dependency generator to locate any imported modules that come from packages. The package modules won’t be included in the dependencies generated, though (but see the -include-pkg-deps option below).
trans-unit.target: 不要忘了在 ghc -M 命令行上使用与编译时相同的 -package 选项；这使依赖项生成器可以找到来自程序包的所有导入模块。但是，软件包模块不会包含在生成的依赖项中（但请参见下面的 -include-pkg-deps 选项）。

trans-unit.source: Don’t generate an import library for a DLL (Windows only)
Don’t generate interface pragmas. Implied by -O0 only.
trans-unit.target: 不要生成界面编译指示。仅由 -O0 隐含。
不要隐式 import Prelude 。由 RebindableSyntax 暗示。

trans-unit.source: Don’t print RTS suggestions about linking with -rtsopts[=⟨none|some|all|ignore|ignoreAll⟩].
trans-unit.target: 不要打印有关与 -rtsopts[=⟨none|some|all|ignore|ignoreAll⟩] 链接的RTS建议。

trans-unit.source: Don’t read either ./.ghci or the other startup files when starting up.
trans-unit.target: 启动时，请勿读取 ./.ghci 或其他启动文件。

trans-unit.source: Don’t use absolute paths in make, configure & co if there is any chance that those might be passed to GHC (or to GHC-compiled programs). Relative paths are fine because cygwin tools are happy with them and GHC accepts / as path-separator. And relative paths don’t depend on where Cygwin’s root directory is located, or on which partition or network drive your source tree happens to reside, as long as you cd there first.
trans-unit.target: 如果有可能将绝对路径传递给GHC（或GHC编译程序），请不要在 make ， configure ＆co中使用绝对路径。相对路径很好，因为cygwin工具对此很满意，GHC接受 / 作为路径分隔符。相对路径并不取决于Cygwin的根目录所在的位置，也不取决于源树恰好驻留在哪个分区或网络驱动器上，只要您先在其中进行 cd 。

trans-unit.source: Don't automatically link in the base and rts packages.
Don't generate an import library for a DLL (Windows only)
Don't generate bindings for Typeable methods
Don't generate interface pragmas. Implied by -O0 only.
Don't print RTS suggestions about linking with -rtsopts[=⟨none|some|all|ignore|ignoreAll⟩].
Double each element of a list:
trans-unit.target: 列表中的每个元素加倍。

trans-unit.target: 双精度浮点数。这种类型最好至少在范围和精度上与IEEE双精度类型相等。

trans-unit.target: 从最小的元素开始,依次放下给定数量的元素。

trans-unit.target: 按照键的顺序,从最小的键开始,放下给定数量的条目。

trans-unit.source: Drop a previous file descriptor registration.
trans-unit.target: 放下以前的文件描述符注册。

trans-unit.source: Drop all the entries whose keys are missing from the other map.
trans-unit.target: 丢掉所有在其他地图上缺少键的条目。

trans-unit.target: 删除文件名。与 takeDirectory 不同，此函数将在目录上保留尾随路径分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Drop the filename. Unlike takeDirectory, this function will leave a trailing path separator on the directory.
trans-unit.target: 删除文件名。与 takeDirectory 不同，此函数将在目录上保留尾随路径分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Drop the given extension from a FilePath, and the "." preceding it. Returns Nothing if the FilePath does not have the given extension, or Just and the part before the extension if it does.
trans-unit.target: 从FilePath中删除给定的扩展名，然后删除 "." 在它之前。如果FilePath没有给定扩展名，则返回 Nothing ;如果没有，则返回 Just 和扩展名之前的部分。

trans-unit.source: Drop the given extension from a FilePath, and the "." preceding it. Returns Nothing if the FilePath does not have the given extension, or Just and the part before the extension if it does.
Due to platform limitations, GHC may fail to produce profiled object files on 32-bit Windows (see Issue #15934).
trans-unit.target: 由于平台限制，GHC可能无法在32位Windows上生成概要分析的目标文件（请参阅问题＃15934）。

trans-unit.source: Due to the nature of GHC’s heap and the heavy optimization that it performs, it is quite difficult to probe the values of bindings at runtime. In this way, the debugging experience of a Haskell program with DWARF support is still a bit impoverished compared to typical imperative debuggers.
trans-unit.target: 由于GHC堆的性质及其执行的大量优化，在运行时探查绑定值非常困难。这样，与典型的命令式调试器相比，具有DWARF支持的Haskell程序的调试经验仍然有些不足。

trans-unit.source: Due to the semantic consistency guarantee of Safe Haskell, we must restrict the function of overlapping instances. We don’t restrict their ability to be defined, as this is a global property and not something we can determine by looking at a single module. Instead, when a module calls a function belonging to a type-class, we check that the instance resolution done is considered ‘safe’. This check is enforced for modules compiled with both -XSafe and -XTrustworthy.
trans-unit.target: 由于Safe Haskell的语义一致性保证，我们必须限制重叠实例的功能。我们不限制其定义的能力，因为这是全局属性，而不是我们可以通过查看单个模块来确定的属性。相反，当模块调用属于类型类的函数时，我们将检查完成的实例解析是否被视为“安全”。对于同时使用 -XSafe 和 -XTrustworthy 编译的模块，将执行此检查。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate a Chan: the duplicate channel begins empty, but data written to either channel from then on will be available from both. Hence this creates a kind of broadcast channel, where data written by anyone is seen by everyone else.
trans-unit.target: 复制 Chan ：重复信道开始空的，但从此写入任一通道数据将可从两者。因此，这创建了一种广播频道，其他人可以看到任何人写入的数据。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate a TChan: the duplicate channel begins empty, but data written to either channel from then on will be available from both. Hence this creates a kind of broadcast channel, where data written by anyone is seen by everyone else.
trans-unit.target: 复制 TChan ：复制通道开始为空，但是从那以后写入任何一个通道的数据将在两个通道中都可用。因此，这创建了一种广播频道，其他人可以看到任何人写入的数据。

trans-unit.source: Duplicates, and elements of the first list, are removed from the the second list, but if the first list contains duplicates, so will the result. It is a special case of unionBy, which allows the programmer to supply their own equality test.
trans-unit.target: 第一个列表的重复项和元素将从第二个列表中移除，但是如果第一个列表包含重复项，则结果也将删除。这是 unionBy 的特例，它允许程序员提供自己的相等性测试。

trans-unit.source: Duplicates, and elements of the first list, are removed from the the second list, but if the first list contains duplicates, so will the result. It is a special case of unionBy, which allows the programmer to supply their own equality test.
trans-unit.target: 第一个列表的重复项和元素将从第二个列表中移除，但是如果第一个列表包含重复项，则结果也将删除。这是 unionBy 的特例，它允许程序员提供自己的相等性测试。

trans-unit.source: During a multiline interaction, the user can interrupt and return to the top-level prompt.
trans-unit.target: 在多行交互过程中,用户可以中断并返回顶层提示。

trans-unit.source: During constraint solving, GHC repeatedly calls tcPluginSolve. This function is provided with the current set of constraints, and should return a TcPluginResult that indicates whether a contradiction was found or progress was made. If the plugin solver makes progress, GHC will re-start the constraint solving pipeline, looping until a fixed point is reached.
trans-unit.target: 在约束求解期间，GHC重复调用 tcPluginSolve 。该函数具有当前的一组约束，并且应返回 TcPluginResult ，指示是否发现了矛盾或取得了进展。如果插件求解程序取得了进展，GHC将重新启动约束求解管道，循环直至达到固定点。

trans-unit.source: During typechecking, GHC will replace an occurrence of an overloaded label like #foo with fromLabel @"foo". This will have some type alpha and require the solution of a class constraint IsLabel "foo" alpha.
trans-unit.target: 在类型检查期间，GHC将使用 fromLabel @"foo" 替换出现的 #foo 等重载标签。这将具有某种类型的 alpha ,并且需要解决类约束 IsLabel "foo" alpha 。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic binding constraints behave just like other type class constraints in that they are automatically propagated. Thus, when a function is used, its implicit parameters are inherited by the function that called it. For example, our sort function might be used to pick out the least value in a list:
trans-unit.target: 动态绑定约束的行为就像其他类型类约束一样，因为它们是自动传播的。因此，当使用一个函数时，其隐式参数将由调用它的函数继承。例如，我们的 sort 函数可能用于选择列表中的最小值：

trans-unit.source: Dynamic link libraries, Win32 DLLs, Win32 On Win32 platforms, the compiler is capable of both producing and using dynamic link libraries (DLLs) containing ghc-compiled code. This section shows you how to make use of this facility.
trans-unit.target: 动态链接库,Win32 DLLs,Win32 在Win32平台上,编译器能够生成和使用包含ghc编译代码的动态链接库(DLLs)。本节将向您介绍如何使用这一工具。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic: A dynamic flag may be used on the command line, in a OPTIONS_GHC pragma in a source file, or set using :set in GHCi.
trans-unit.target: 动态的：动态标志可以在命令行中，源文件的 OPTIONS_GHC 编译指示中使用，或在GHCi中使用 :set 设置。
动态地结合一个可变的(非遗传的)。
实验性的! 不要使用。

trans-unit.source: Each (term) variable mentioned in a rule must either be in scope (e.g. map), or bound by the forall (e.g. f, g, xs). The variables bound by the forall are called the pattern variables. They are separated by spaces, just like in a type forall.
trans-unit.target: 在规则中提到的每个（术语）变量必须是在范围（例如 map ），或通过结合的 forall 的（例如 f ， g ， xs ）。由 forall 绑定的变量称为模式变量。它们之间用空格隔开，就像在 forall 类型中一样。
每个 OptDescr 都描述一个选项。

trans-unit.source: Each Haskell source module should be placed in a file on its own.
trans-unit.target: 每个Haskell源码模块都应该单独放在一个文件中。

trans-unit.source: Each declaration group is mutually recursive only within the group. Declaration groups can refer to definitions within previous groups, but not later ones.
trans-unit.target: 每个声明组只在组内互为递归。宣言组可以指以前组内的定义,但不能指以后的定义。

trans-unit.source: Each event is associated with a timestamp which is the number of nanoseconds since the start of executation of the running program. This is the elapsed time, not the CPU time.

Each file system object is referenced by a path. There is normally at least one absolute path to each file system object. In some operating systems, it may also be possible to have paths which are relative to the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 每个文件系统对象都由路径引用。通常，每个文件系统对象至少有一个绝对路径。在某些操作系统中，也可能具有相对于当前目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: Each function has a variant, whose name is suffixed with -With, that gives greater control over the handling of decoding errors. For instance, decodeUtf8 will throw an exception, but decodeUtf8With allows the programmer to determine what to do on a decoding error.
trans-unit.target: 每个函数都有一个变种，其名称后缀- With ，即给出了解码错误的处理更大的控制权。例如， decodeUtf8 将引发异常，但是 decodeUtf8With 允许程序员确定对解码错误采取的措施。

trans-unit.source: Each function has a variant, whose name is suffixed with -With, that gives greater control over the handling of decoding errors. For instance, decodeUtf8 will throw an exception, but decodeUtf8With allows the programmer to determine what to do on a decoding error.

trans-unit.source: Each of the monad transformers introduces relevant operations. In a sequence of monad transformers, most of these operations.can be lifted through other transformers using lift or the mapXXXT combinator, but a few with more complex type signatures require specialized lifting combinators, called liftOp (see Control.Monad.Signatures).
trans-unit.target: 每个monad变压器都会介绍相关操作。在一系列monad变压器中，大多数这些操作都可以使用 lift 或 map XXX T 组合器通过其他变压器进行提升，但是一些具有更复杂类型特征的签名需要专门的提升组合器，称为 lift Op（请参见Control.Monad.Signatures）。

trans-unit.source: Each reference is given a key which can be used to locate it at runtime with GHC.StaticPtr.unsafeLookupStaticPtr which uses a global and immutable table called the Static Pointer Table. trans-unit.source: Effects other than throwing an error are also overriden by the deeper layers. For example, StateT s Maybe a represents a value of type s -> Maybe (a, s), so if an error thrown from f causes this function to return Nothing, any changes to the state which f also performed will be erased. As a result, g will see the state as it was before f. Once g completes, f's error will be rethrown, so g' state changes will be erased as well. This is the normal interaction between effects in a monad transformer stack.

Efficiency: When the same view function is applied in multiple branches of a function definition or a case expression (e.g., in size above), GHC makes an attempt to collect these applications into a single nested case expression, so that the view function is only applied once. Pattern compilation in GHC follows the matrix algorithm described in Chapter 4 of The Implementation of Functional Programming Languages. When the top rows of the first column of a matrix are all view patterns with the “same” expression, these patterns are transformed into a single nested case. This includes, for example, adjacent view patterns that line up in a tuple, as in
trans-unit.target: 效率：当同一个视图函数应用于函数定义或case表达式的多个分支（例如，上面的 size ）时，GHC会尝试将这些应用程序收集到单个嵌套的case表达式中，因此view函数只是申请一次。 GHC中的模式编译遵循《函数式编程语言的实现》第4章中描述的矩阵算法。当矩阵第一列的顶部行都是带有“相同”表达式的视图模式时，这些模式将转换为单个嵌套的大小写。例如，这包括在一个元组中排列的相邻视图模式，例如

Efficient encoding of Ints as decimal numbers is performed by intDec. Optimization potential exists for the escaping of Strings. The above implementation has two optimization opportunities. The following implementation exploits these optimizations.

trans-unit.source: Enable the concurrent mark-and-sweep garbage collector for old generation collectors. Typically GHC uses a stop-the-world copying garbage collector for all generations. This can cause long pauses in execution during major garbage collections. --nonmoving-gc enables the use of a concurrent mark-and-sweep garbage collector for oldest generation collections. Under this collection strategy oldest-generation garbage collection can proceed concurrently with mutation.

trans-unit.target: 启用Unicode字符代替其等效的ASCII序列。

trans-unit.source: Enable the use of a pre-processor (set with -pgmF ⟨cmd⟩)
trans-unit.target: 启用预处理器（通过 -pgmF ⟨cmd⟩ ）

trans-unit.source: Enable the use of newtypes over types with non-lifted runtime representations.
Enable the use of un-parenthesized negative numeric literals.
trans-unit.target: 启用未分化的负数文字。

trans-unit.source: Enable the use of unboxed sum syntax.
Enable the use of unboxed tuple syntax.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用未装箱的元组语法。

trans-unit.source: Enable the worker-wrapper transformation after a strictness analysis pass. Implied by -O, and by -fstrictness. Disabled by -fno-strictness. Enabling -fworker-wrapper while strictness analysis is disabled (by -fno-strictness) has no effect.
Enable type application syntax in terms and types.
trans-unit.target: 启用术语和类型的类型应用语法。
启用类型族。表示 ExplicitNamespaces ， KindSignatures 和 MonoLocalBinds 。
启用类型运算符。暗示 ExplicitNamespaces 。

trans-unit.source: Enable type synonyms in instance heads. Implied by FlexibleInstances.
trans-unit.target: 在实例头中启用类型同义词。由 FlexibleInstances 隐含。

trans-unit.source: Enable use of explicit namespaces in module export lists.
trans-unit.target: 启用在模块导出列表中使用显式命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Enable use of the #foo overloaded label syntax.
trans-unit.target: 启用 #foo 重载标签语法的使用。

trans-unit.source: Enable using the keyword type to specify the namespace of entries in imports and exports (Explicit namespaces in import/export). Implied by TypeOperators and TypeFamilies.
trans-unit.target: 启用使用关键字 type 来指定导入和导出中条目的命名空间（import / export中的显式命名空间）。由 TypeOperators 和 TypeFamilies 隐含。

trans-unit.source: Enabled by PolyKinds, GHC supports explicit kind quantification, as in these examples:
trans-unit.target: 在 PolyKinds 的支持下，GHC支持显式种类定量，如以下示例所示：

trans-unit.source: Enables an alternative algorithm for choosing where to use <*> in conjunction with the ApplicativeDo language extension. This algorithm always finds the optimal solution, but it is expensive: O(n^3), so this option can lead to long compile times when there are very large do expressions (over 100 statements). The default ApplicativeDo algorithm is O(n^2).
trans-unit.target: 启用用于选择 <*> 结合 ApplicativeDo 语言扩展名使用的替代算法。该算法总能找到最佳解决方案，但是它很昂贵： O(n^3) ，所以当存在非常大的 do 表达式（超过100个语句）时，此选项可能导致较长的编译时间。默认的 ApplicativeDo 算法为 O(n^2) 。
启用退出优化。由 -O 暗示。

trans-unit.source: Enables the allocation counter to be treated as a limit for the current thread. When the allocation limit is enabled, if the allocation counter counts down below zero, the thread will be sent the AllocationLimitExceeded asynchronous exception. When this happens, the counter is reinitialised (by default to 100K, but tunable with the +RTS -xq option) so that it can handle the exception and perform any necessary clean up. If it exhausts this additional allowance, another AllocationLimitExceeded exception is sent, and so forth. Like other asynchronous exceptions, the AllocationLimitExceeded exception is deferred while the thread is inside mask or an exception handler in catch.

Enables the allocation counter to be treated as a limit for the current thread. When the allocation limit is enabled, if the allocation counter counts down below zero, the thread will be sent the AllocationLimitExceeded asynchronous exception. When this happens, the counter is reinitialised (by default to 100K, but tunable with the +RTS -xq option) so that it can handle the exception and perform any necessary clean up. If it exhausts this additional allowance, another AllocationLimitExceeded exception is sent, and so forth. Like other asynchronous exceptions, the AllocationLimitExceeded exception is deferred while the thread is inside mask or an exception handler in catch.
trans-unit.target: 允许将分配计数器视为当前线程的限制。启用分配限制后，如果分配计数器递减计数到零以下，则将向线程发送 AllocationLimitExceeded 异步异常。发生这种情况时，计数器将重新初始化（默认为100K，但可以使用 +RTS -xq 选项进行调整），以便它可以处理异常并执行任何必要的清除操作。如果用尽了这笔额外的津贴，则会发送另一个 AllocationLimitExceeded 异常，依此类推。与其他异步异常一样，当线程位于 mask 或 catch 中的异常处理程序内部时，将推迟 AllocationLimitExceeded 异常。

trans-unit.source: Enables the common block elimination optimisation in the code generator. This optimisation attempts to find identical Cmm blocks and eliminate the duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 启用代码生成器中的通用块消除优化功能。该优化试图找到相同的Cmm块,并消除重复的块。

trans-unit.source: Enables the common-sub-expression elimination optimisation on the STG intermediate language, where it is able to common up some subexpressions that differ in their types, but not their representation.
Enables the common-sub-expression elimination optimisation on the STG intermediate language, where it is able to common up some subexpressions that differ in their types, but not their represetation.
trans-unit.target: 在STG中级语言上启用共同子表达式消除优化,它能够共同一些类型不同的子表达式,但不消除它们的重排。

trans-unit.source: Enables the common-sub-expression elimination optimisation. Switching this off can be useful if you have some unsafePerformIO expressions that you don’t want commoned-up.
trans-unit.target: 启用公共子表达式消除优化。如果您有一些 unsafePerformIO 表达式，则将其关闭很有用。

trans-unit.source: Enables the floating of exit paths out of recursive functions.
trans-unit.target: 使得递归函数的退出路径浮动。

trans-unit.source: Enables the late lambda lifting optimisation on the STG intermediate language. This selectively lifts local functions to top-level by converting free variables into function parameters.
trans-unit.target: 在STG中间语言上实现后期lambda提升优化。通过将自由变量转换为函数参数,选择性地将局部函数提升到顶层。

trans-unit.source: Enables the sinking pass in the code generator. This optimisation attempts to find identical Cmm blocks and eliminate the duplicates attempts to move variable bindings closer to their usage sites. It also inlines simple expressions like literals or registers.
trans-unit.target: 启用代码生成器中的下沉通道。这种优化试图找到相同的Cmm块,并消除重复的变量绑定,试图将变量绑定移到更接近它们的使用地点。它还可以内联一些简单的表达式,如字元或寄存器。

trans-unit.source: Enables the use of the hash character (#) as an identifier suffix.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用井号（ # ）作为标识符后缀。

trans-unit.source: Enables warnings when the compiler encounters a -W... flag that is not recognised.
trans-unit.target: 当编译器遇到无法识别的 -W... 标志时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: Enabling these options is the only effect of -fglasgow-exts. We are trying to move away from this portmanteau flag, and towards enabling features individually.
trans-unit.target: 启用这些选项是 -fglasgow-exts 的唯一作用。我们正在努力摆脱这个portmanteau标志，朝着单独启用功能迈进。
